data.lyric:
[ti:Let It Snow! Let It Snow! Let It Snow!b]
[ar:Dean Martin]
[al:Little Donkey]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Let It Snow! Let It Snow! Let It Snow!b - Dean Martin (迪安·马丁)
[00:04.47]Lyrics by：Dean Martin
[00:08.95]Composed by：Dean Martin
[00:13.43]Oh the weather outside is frightful
[00:16.67]But the fire is so delightful
[00:20.21]And since we've no place to go
[00:23.69]Let it snow let it snow let it snow
[00:27.33]Man it doesn't show signs of stopping
[00:30.73]And I've brought me some corn for popping
[00:34.66]The lights are turned way down low
[00:37.91]Let it snow let it snow
[00:41.73]When we finally kiss goodnight
[00:45.00]How I'll hate going out in the storm
[00:48.67]But if you really hold me tight
[00:52.58]All the way home I'll be warm
[00:55.78]And the fire is slowly dying
[00:59.35]And my dear we're still goodbying
[01:02.86]But as long as you love me so
[01:06.22]Let it snow let it snow and snow
[01:24.53]When we finally kiss goodnight
[01:27.75]How I'll hate going out in the storm
[01:31.33]But if you really grab me tight
[01:35.15]All the way home I'll be warm
[01:38.20]Oh the fire is slowly dying
[01:41.93]And my dear we're still goodbying
[01:45.29]But as long as you love me so
[01:48.82]Let it snow let it snow let it snow
data.trans:
[ti:Let It Snow! Let It Snow! Let It Snow!b]
[ar:Dean Martin]
[al:Little Donkey]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]以下歌词翻译由微信翻译提供
[00:04.47]//
[00:08.95]//
[00:13.43]外面的天气糟糕透顶
[00:16.67]但烈火如此令人愉悦
[00:20.21]因为我们无处可去
[00:23.69]让雪下起来
[00:27.33]朋友这一切没有停止的迹象
[00:30.73]我带了一些玉米来给自己做点好东西
[00:34.66]灯光调暗一点
[00:37.91]让雪下起来
[00:41.73]当我们终于互道晚安
[00:45.00]我多么讨厌在狂风暴雨中出门
[00:48.67]但如果你真的紧紧抱着我
[00:52.58]一路回家我会感到温暖
[00:55.78]火焰慢慢熄灭
[00:59.35]亲爱的我们依然在道别
[01:02.86]但只要你真心爱我
[01:06.22]让雪下起来让雪越下越大
[01:24.53]当我们终于互道晚安
[01:27.75]我多么讨厌在狂风暴雨中出门
[01:31.33]但如果你真的紧紧地抱着我
[01:35.15]一路回家我会感到温暖
[01:38.20]爱火慢慢熄灭
[01:41.93]亲爱的我们依然在道别
[01:45.29]但只要你真心爱我
[01:48.82]让雪下起来
